mapper.insert: insert into movie(movieTitle, poster, movieContent, movieUrl, cate1, cate2, movieCheck, buyPrice, rentalPrice, movieDate) values(#{movieTitle}, #{poster}, #{movieContent}, #{movieUrl}, #{cate1}, #{cate2}, #{movieCheck}, #{buyPrice}, #{rentalPrice}, #{movieDate})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from movie
where movieTitle like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
mapper.update: update movie set movieTitle = #{movieTitle}, poster = #{poster}, movieContent = #{movieContent}, movieUrl = #{movieUrl}, cate1 = #{cate1}, cate2 = #{cate2}, movieCheck = #{movieCheck}, buyPrice = #{buyPrice}, rentalPrice = #{rentalPrice}, movieDate = #{movieDate} where movieId = #{movieId}
